name: Orcs & Knocks
description:
Fifth project developed at the university. A classic arcade beat'em up 2.5D.  It consists in 2 levels and a boss battle, with a simple narrative to entertain the player. There are no saving points but you can revive if you have enough score, expect a medium-high difficulty (10 min of gameplay approx..).

It was made with Unity. Using additional coding, royalty free extra assets and hand made assets. This is a practice not a finish commercial game, therefore expect some issues.

Item Food: heals you.

Item Amulet: gives immortality a brief period of time.

A - Move LeftD - Move RightW - Move UpS - Move DownSpace - JumpSpace + E - Flying Kick
E - AttackE (on an Item) - Take ItemAlt + F4 - Close game
